comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: OP simply means original poster. It helps other users know the original poster of the thread. Quote from: teoliya33 on July 23, 2023, 08:12:52 AMAnd how long till I got Merits here?  + i had made some useful posts, well its 3-4 but still useful to the community! Other members will judge whether or not your posts are valuable, and if they are as helpful as you claim, merits will eventually be given. Although you should be concentrating on expanding your knowledge rather than receiving merits, newbies are constantly more interested in moving up the ranks than learning.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: teoliya33 on July 23, 2023, 08:12:52 AMHello EldersWhat is that OP next to my profile name?And how long till I got Merits here?  I'm here for selling and gaining knowledge and i cant stay NEWBIE forever  + i had made some useful posts, well its 3-4 but still useful to the community! ***This post not asking for Merits or something !! just for knowledge Welcome to the forum and I hope you enjoy your crypto journey here. Taking for instance the question you asked about the meaning of op, I didn't know what it means, I only had an assumption of what the meaning was until I stumbled on a topic where it was discussed and that's how I got to know the true meaning. So my point is you can actually learn by asking questions and also from the response to the questions asked by other persons. Also, You get rewarded with merit for your contribution on the forum which is a requirement to rank up but you shouldn't chase it. Read more, learn more, improve yourself, make quality posts and the merit will come.
